lines.text:
[singing]
I don't bother work, work don't bother me; I'se fo' times happy as a bumblebee. Eats and sleeps mos' all th' time; I don't give a dog-gone if the sun don't never shine.
Work's going to bother you, you lazy son-of-a-sea cook. Get below and prepare me some grub!
Yore remarks is entirely too personal, Suh!
So my hearty, you would play the hog. Give me that Chart or I will wring your neck.
